00300     inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, RStat::who_type who) {
00301       switch( who ) {
00302       case RStat::self:
00303        return out<<"self";
00304       case RStat::children:
00305        return out<<"children";
00306       default:
00307        return out<<"???";
00308       }

00339     class RStatLap {
00340     public:
00348       RStatLap(RStat &output, RStat::who_type who)
00349        :m_output(output), m_start(who) {
00350       }
00356       ~RStatLap() {
00357        RStat end(m_start.who());
00358        m_output = m_output+(end-m_start);
00359       }
00360
